data.caption: Approval Of Reserve Bank Of India For Reappointment Of Mr. Sanjay Agarwal As Managing Director & CEO Of AU Small Finance Bank Limited
data.news_body:
This is with reference to our letters dated October 17 2025 and December 26 2025 informing about Board and Shareholders approval for the re-appointment of Mr. Sanjay Agarwal (DIN: 00009526) as Managing Director & CEO of the Bank for a period of 3 (three) years w.e.f. April 19 2026 subject to approval of the Reserve Bank of India. 

In this regard we wish to inform you that the Reserve Bank of India vide its letter dated February 12 2026 has approved the re-appointment of Mr. Sanjay Agarwal as Managing Director & CEO of the Bank for a period of 3 (three) years w.e.f. April 19 2026.

data.caption: Disclosure Regarding Change In The Constitution Of The Joint Statutory Auditor
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that one of the Joint Statutory Auditors of the Bank M S K A & Associates Chartered Accountants have intimated the Bank vide their letter dated January 16 2026 that the firm has been converted into a Limited Liability Partnership (LLP) under the provisions of the Limited Liability Partnership Act 2008 and is now known as M S K A & Associates LLP Chartered Accountants (ICAI Firm Registration No. is 105047W/W101187) with effect from January 13 2026. 

The aforesaid conversion does not result in any change to the existing audit engagement. M S K A & Associates LLP will continue to function and discharge their obligations as Joint Statutory Auditors of the Bank for the remaining period of the tenure.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body:
We wish to inform that based on the recommendation of Nomination and Remuneration Committee the Board of Directors of the Bank (Board) at its meeting held today on November 24 2025 has inter-alia considered and approved the following: 
1. Appointment of Mr. Narasinganallore Venkatesh Srinivasan (Mr. N S Venkatesh) (DIN: 01893686) as Non-Executive Independent Director (Additional Director) on the Board of the Bank with effect from November 25 2025 for a term of 3 (three) years subject to approval of the Shareholders. 
2. Appointment of Mr. Satyajit Dwivedi (DIN: 08118455) as Non-Executive Independent Director (Additional Director) on the Board of the Bank with effect from November 25 2025 for a term of 3 (three) years subject to approval of the Shareholders. 
3. Re-appointment of Ms. Malini Thadani (DIN: 01516555) as Non-Executive Independent Director of the Bank for a second term of 3 (three) years w.e.f. November 25 2025 subject to approval of the Shareholders.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that Mr. Rajeev Yadav Deputy CEO categorized as Senior Management Personnel of AU Small Finance Bank Limited (Bank) has tendered his resignation on October 27 2025 to pursue other opportunities. The Bank has accepted his resignation and he will be relieved from the services of the Bank with effect from the close of business hours on October 31 2025.

data.caption: Intimation For Change Of Website Domain Name Of AU Small Finance Bank Limited
data.news_body:
We hereby inform that the RBI vide its circular RBI/2025-26/28 CO.DIT.DCD.No.S81/01-71-110/2025-26 dated April 22 2025 had advised all banks to commence the migration of their existing domains to the .bank.in domain. Accordingly the domain name of the AU Small Finance Bank Limited (the Bank) has migrated from https://www.aubank.in/ to a new secure website domain https://www.au.bank.in/. 

The domain https://www.aubank.in/ will continue to remain active and secure for all our customers banking needs during the transition.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body:
We hereby inform that Prof. M.S. Sriram (DIN: 00588922) and Mr. Pushpinder Singh (DIN: 08496066) Independent Directors of the Bank have completed their respective tenures. Accordingly they have ceased to be Independent Directors of the Bank from the close of business hours on October 20 2025. 

The Board of Directors and the entire Bank places on record their sincere appreciation for the invaluable contributions made by Prof. M.S. Sriram and Mr. Pushpinder Singh during their tenure as Independent Directors. Their guidance and insights have been instrumental in the Banks growth and governance. We extend our heartfelt gratitude and wish them continued success in all their future endeavours.

The details required under Regulation 30 of the Listing Regulations read with SEBI Circular No. SEBI/HO/CFD/PoD2/CIR/P/0155 dated November 11 2024 as amended are given in the enclosed Annexure.

data.news_body:
We hereby inform that consequent to the untimely and sudden demise of Late Shri Vimal Jain Chief Financial Officer of AU Small Finance Bank as intimated vide our letter dated September 10 2025 the Board of Directors of the Bank at its meeting held today i.e. September 26 2025 considered and appointed Mr. Gaurav Jain as Interim Chief Financial Officer and Key Managerial Personnel of the Bank with effect from Friday September 26 2025 till further update in this regard.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Demise
data.news_body: With deep grief & intense sorrow we hereby inform about the sad & untimely demise of Mr. Vimal Jain Chief Financial Officer of the Bank on September 10 2025. Vimal Ji as he was fondly referred to was associated with the Bank since 2010 and was a pillar of strength for the Bank & the Finance & Accounts function playing a crucial leadership role throughout his 15+ years of career with the Bank. He was a deeply loved and admired leader whose perseverance keen learning aptitude and exemplary leadership capabilities paved the way for his emergence as a credible and respected banker.  The strong team created by him in Finance and Accounts will carry forward his vision and legacy with commitment as a true tribute to him. Mr. Vimal Jains sudden and unexpected passing away today morning due to a cardiac arrest will be an irreparable loss to the Bank and his presence will be deeply missed. The Bank expresses deep sympathy and condolences to his family.

data.caption: Reserve Bank Of IndiaS In-Principle Approval For Transition From A Small Finance Bank Into Universal Bank
data.news_body:
In continuation to our letter no. AUSFB/SEC/2024-25/231 dated September 03 2024 informing about application to the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) to seek approval for voluntary transition from a Small Finance Bank to Universal Bank we are pleased to inform that AU Small Finance Bank (AU / Bank) has today i.e. on August 7 2025 received an in-principle approval from RBI for transition from a Small Finance Bank to Universal Bank. Copy of RBIs press release dated August 7 2025 is attached herewith as Annexure-1. 

Press release of the Bank in this regard is attached herewith as Annexure-2. 

Please refer attachment for details.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release
data.news_body:
We are pleased to inform that AU Small Finance Bank Limited (the Bank) has entered into strategic corporate agency partnership with SBI Life Insurance Company Limited (SBI Life) aimed to enhance access to comprehensive insurance solutions nationwide by extending financial protection to underserved and emerging markets across India. 

With this alliance the Bank will distribute SBI Lifes comprehensive portfolio of life insurance solutions including protection savings & investments child money back retirement etc.  across its robust network of over 2505 banking touchpoints in 21 states and 4 union territories. This integration will enable customers to meet diverse protection and long-term financial planning needs through a unified banking and insurance experience. 

The press release on the aforesaid is enclosed herewith.

data.caption: AU Small Finance Bank Partners With LIC To Expand Life Insurance Access Across India
data.news_body:
We are pleased to inform that AU Small Finance Bank Limited has entered into strategic partnership with Life Insurance Corporation of India (LIC) aimed at deepening insurance penetration and financial protection across Indias underserved population. 

Under this tie-up the Bank will distribute LICs comprehensive portfolio of life insurance solutions including term insurance endowment plans whole life policies pension and annuity products and child-specific plans catering to a broad spectrum of protection and retirement needs.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Directorate
data.news_body:
In continuation to the prior intimation of Board meeting submitted vide our letter dated June 25 2025 it is hereby informed that the Board of Directors of AU Small Finance Bank Limited (the Bank) at its Meeting held on Saturday June 28 2025 has inter-alia considered and approved the  appointment of Mr. Jagajit Mangal Prasad (DIN: 11146660) as Non-Executive Independent Director (Additional Director) on the Board of the Bank with effect from July 1 2025 for a period of 3 years on the recommendation of Nomination and Remuneration Committee subject to approval of the Shareholders. 

It is confirmed that Mr. Jagajit Mangal Prasad is not debarred from holding the office of Director by virtue of any SEBI order or any other such authority and he is not disqualified from holding the office of director pursuant to provisions of Section 164 of the Companies Act 2013. 

Please refer attached outcome for details.
